name: Bane
message: So, you think darkness is your ally? You merely adopted the dark. I was born in it. Moulded by it. I didnt see the light till I was a man and by that time it was BLINDING

name: Gandalf Stormcrow
message: A wizard is neither early nor late. He arrives precisely when he means to.

name: Emperor Palpatine
message: Do it. Embrace the dark side.

name: Moly Weasley
message: Ronald Weasly! How dare you steal that car!

name: Tyrion Lannister
message: I have been on trial for being a dwarf since the day I was born. I didnt do it. I did not kill Jeoffry, but I wish that I had. Watching your viscious bastard die, gave me more pleasure than a thousand lying whores.I wish I was the monster you all think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.
